We hereby certify that our Registration Certificate under the Goods and Services Tax Act, 2017 is in force on the date on which the sale of the goods specified in this Bill/Invoice is made by us. The goods sold are intended for Resale/Use in the manufacture of Taxable/Exempted goods for sale and the Transaction here in satisfies the conditions laid down under section 6(2) of the CST Act, 1956 for the issue of the Declaration Form C under Rule 12(1) of the CST Rules. We are not paying Freight Charges. It shall be paid by the party. We further certify that we are selling you above goods to the party as a seller, the ownership of all these Goods will remain in possession of Jain Machine Tools & Electricals in the event of any dispute or Delayed payment.
